channel.title: Comments on: Timing Details With cURL

item.title: By: David Bond
item.dc:creator: David Bond
item.description: Almost - in later versions, you have to put "n" at the end of each line in the format file.
item.content:encoded: Almost – in later versions, you have to put “n” at the end of each line in the format file.

item.title: By: Pawan
item.dc:creator: Pawan
item.description: How do we print out in newline in windows dos prompt ?
item.content:encoded: How do we print out in newline in windows dos prompt ?

item.title: By: josephscott
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2011/10/14/timing-details-with-curl/#comment-39170">Santhosh</a>.
They are described in the cURL man page - https://curl.haxx.se/docs/manpage.html
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Santhosh.

They are described in the cURL man page – https://curl.haxx.se/docs/manpage.html

item.title: By: Santhosh
item.dc:creator: Santhosh
item.description:
Could someone explain the meaning of each parameter?
time_namelookup: time_connect: time_appconnect: time_pretransfer: time_redirect: time_starttransfer: time_total:
item.content:encoded:
Could someone explain the meaning of each parameter?

time_namelookup:
time_connect:
time_appconnect:
time_pretransfer:
time_redirect:
time_starttransfer:
time_total:

item.title: By: Colegatron
item.dc:creator: Colegatron
item.description: Thank you so much for this tip, this is awesome! 20 years using curl and never figured out about using a file to format the output.
item.content:encoded:
Thank you so much for this tip, this is awesome!
20 years using curl and never figured out about using a file to format the output.

item.title: By: josephscott
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2011/10/14/timing-details-with-curl/#comment-27706">Myapp</a>.
I don't have any examples on that. I'd say curl_easy_getinfo() might be a good place to start though - https://curl.haxx.se/libcurl/c/curl_easy_getinfo.html
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Myapp.

I don’t have any examples on that. I’d say curl_easy_getinfo() might be a good place to start though – https://curl.haxx.se/libcurl/c/curl_easy_getinfo.html

item.title: By: Myapp
item.dc:creator: Myapp
item.description: Nice post. Can you please help by specifying how to get these timing details while using libcurl in C/C++?
item.content:encoded:
Nice post.
Can you please help by specifying how to get these timing details while using libcurl in C/C++?

item.title: By: quick and dirty response time testing – Carls SLOG
item.dc:creator: quick and dirty response time testing – Carls SLOG

item.title: By: HTTPS对性能影响分析（三） – 运维那点事
item.dc:creator: HTTPS对性能影响分析（三） – 运维那点事
item.description: […] 上面命令中的w参数表示指定输出格式，time_connect变量表示TCP握手的耗时，time_appconnect变量表示SSL握手的耗时（更多变量请查看文档和实例），s参数和o参数用来关闭标准输出。 […]
item.content:encoded: […] 上面命令中的w参数表示指定输出格式，time_connect变量表示TCP握手的耗时，time_appconnect变量表示SSL握手的耗时（更多变量请查看文档和实例），s参数和o参数用来关闭标准输出。 […]
